text: On Golden Pond is a 1979 play by Ernest Thompson. The play is about an old couple Ethel and Norman Thayer, who spend each summer at their home on a lake called Golden Pond. During the year the story takes place, they are visited by daughter Chelsea with her fianc√© Billy Ray and his son Billy Ray Jr. In 2001, CBS aired a live television version starring Julie Andrews and Christopher Plummer. ==References== Category:American plays Category:1979 works Category:1970s plays
title: On Golden Pond (play)
